featured.title: psych ward room optimization
featured.summary: inpatient psych ward space optimization with linear programming
featured.full_description: Inpatient psych ward space optimization using linear programming

expanded_content.problem: optimizing room assignments in a 26-bed psychiatric facility while balancing patient acuity levels, staff resources, and safety constraints
expanded_content.approach: linear programming with pulp library. modeled complex constraints including patients deemed unsafe for others or themselves requiring their own room, other patients could double in a room
expanded_content.results: achieved 99.99% bed utilization efficiency through optimal configuration of 10 single rooms and 8 double rooms (vs current all-double configuration), reducing bed waste from 52 to just 2 beds over 4-month test period while maintaining patient safety requirements
expanded_content.impact: presented at apa conference. adopted by original facilities. demonstrates practical application of operations research in healthcare

featured.title: geo causal inference
featured.summary: measuring causal effects of marketing interventions with time-based regression (tbr) with matched...
featured.full_description: Measuring causal effects of marketing interventions using Time-Based Regression (TBR) with Matched Markets methodology

expanded_content.problem: measuring true causal effects of marketing interventions when randomized direct experiments aren't feasible
expanded_content.approach: time-based regression with matched markets methodology. leverages geographic variation as natural experiments
expanded_content.results: identified promising geo regions for TV ad implementation and enabled confident impact assessment
expanded_content.impact: enables data-driven marketing decisions with rigorous statistical backing

featured.title: sd civic data
featured.summary: 7-project civic data platform covering san diego's budget, services, housing, transportation, cli...
featured.full_description: 7-project civic data platform covering San Diego's budget, services, housing, transportation, climate, public safety, and homelessness — each with pipeline, Streamlit dashboard, FastAPI, and MCP server

expanded_content.problem: san diego publishes open data across dozens of portals but nobody connects the dots — budget to services to housing to safety. residents can't trace how tax dollars flow into outcomes
expanded_content.approach: built 7 interconnected projects on a shared architecture: duckdb + parquet pipeline → streamlit dashboard → fastapi rest api → mcp server for claude. each project answers questions the previous one raises. monthly github actions refresh keeps data current
expanded_content.results: 75 api endpoints, 7 interactive dashboards, 7 mcp servers. covers 311 service requests (3M+ records), city budget (FY2011-2026), housing permits (2002-present), traffic & transit, climate action, public safety, and homelessness
expanded_content.impact: a connected story about how the city spends, serves, grows, and evolves — all from open public data. live dashboards: 311 services · city budget · housing permits · traffic & transit · climate action · public safety · homelessness

featured.title: content pulse
featured.summary: llm-powered content aggregator and analyzer for extracting real-time insights from social media a...
featured.full_description: LLM-powered content aggregator and analyzer for extracting real-time insights from social media and news sources

expanded_content.problem: crypto market moves faster than human analysis can track. signal often buried in social media noise
expanded_content.approach: real-time ingestion from multiple sources. llm-powered sentiment extraction and trend identification
expanded_content.results: personal tool for scraping multiple news outlets in the morning
expanded_content.impact: provides traders with early market intelligence through automated analysis

featured.title: econdash
featured.summary: airflow and postgresql data pipeline for bea economic data
featured.full_description: Airflow and PostgreSQL data pipeline for BEA economic data

expanded_content.problem: economic data scattered across federal agencies. manual collection error-prone and time-consuming
expanded_content.approach: airflow orchestration with bea api integration. postgresql storage with dbt transformations
expanded_content.results: automated daily updates of 50+ economic indicators. 99.9% pipeline reliability
expanded_content.impact: enables real-time economic analysis with production-grade infrastructure

featured.title: ethoscope
featured.summary: comprehensive ethereum network monitoring platform tracking gas prices, mev activity, and l2 migr...
featured.full_description: Comprehensive Ethereum network monitoring platform tracking gas prices, MEV activity, and L2 migration patterns with real-time ETL pipeline and predictive analytics

expanded_content.problem: ethereum network health monitoring requires real-time analysis of gas prices, mev activity, and l2 migration patterns across fragmented data sources
expanded_content.approach: real-time etl pipeline with web3.py and alchemy api. timescaledb for efficient time-series storage. prophet and scikit-learn for predictive analytics
expanded_content.results: automated collection of blockchain metrics with reliable data ingestion. comprehensive historical data storage for trend analysis
expanded_content.impact: personal tool for understanding ethereum metrics and gaining hands-on experience in the web3 space

featured.title: ope base
featured.summary: analytics platform for tracking music artist engagement across twitter, instagram, and reddit. im...
featured.full_description: Analytics platform for tracking music artist engagement across Twitter, Instagram, and Reddit. Implements bot detection with Isolation Forest, clustering for user segmentation, and trend analysis to optimize content strategy

expanded_content.problem: music artists lack data-driven insights for content strategy. engagement patterns obscured by bots and noise
expanded_content.approach: multi-year social media tracking with ml analysis. isolation forest for bot detection, clustering for audience segmentation
expanded_content.results: identified optimal posting times, content types, and audience segments. detected 15-20% bot activity in engagement metrics
expanded_content.impact: enabled data-driven content strategy for independent artists. insights applicable across music industry

featured.title: arcope website
featured.summary: interactive website for solo electronic project arcope featuring network/data aesthetics inspired...
featured.full_description: Interactive website for solo electronic project Arcope featuring network/data aesthetics inspired by Odesza

expanded_content.problem: solo electronic music project needed web presence reflecting odesza-inspired sound and data/network aesthetics
expanded_content.approach: react with framer motion animations. vibe-coded frontend exploring creative web development outside backend comfort zone
expanded_content.results: interactive site with network-inspired visuals matching the musical aesthetic. deployed on netlify with docker dev environment
expanded_content.impact: demonstrates versatility beyond backend/data work. shows willingness to learn and experiment with new domains

featured.title: lost in tropez website
featured.summary: vibrant website for electronic dance duo lost in tropez with retro psychedelic aesthetics inspire...
featured.full_description: Vibrant website for electronic dance duo Lost in Tropez with retro psychedelic aesthetics inspired by Polo & Pan

expanded_content.problem: electronic dance duo inspired by polo & pan needed vibrant web presence with retro psychedelic aesthetics
expanded_content.approach: typescript react with vite build system. embraced experimental frontend development to match group's playful energy
expanded_content.results: colorful, animated site capturing the duo's tropical electronic vibe. containerized development for consistent environments
expanded_content.impact: showcases creative side and ability to translate musical aesthetics into visual web experiences

featured.title: signal 23 website
featured.summary: interactive website for electronic duo signal-23 featuring dystopian noise effects and data/numbe...
featured.full_description: Interactive website for electronic duo Signal-23 featuring dystopian noise effects and data/numbers station aesthetics

expanded_content.problem: electronic duo exploring moderat-inspired themes needed dystopian web presence reflecting data/numbers station aesthetics
expanded_content.approach: react with interactive noise effects and signal animations. webpack build with custom visual effects matching dark electronic sound
expanded_content.results: immersive site with dynamic signal effects creating atmospheric experience. successfully deployed capturing dystopian aesthetic
expanded_content.impact: demonstrates ability to create experiential web interfaces that align with artistic vision

projects.title: racksmith
projects.summary: cli tool to programmatically generate ableton live audio effect racks (.adg files) from simple co...
projects.full_description: CLI tool to programmatically generate Ableton Live audio effect racks (.adg files) from simple commands or AI-assisted prompts

expanded_content.problem: building effect chains in ableton is tedious menu-clicking when you'd rather be making music. push 3 standalone makes this even more painful
expanded_content.approach: reverse-engineered .adg format (gzip-compressed xml). built template extraction from real racks, chain syntax parser, macro mapping system, and ai-assisted generation via llm prompts
expanded_content.results: generate complex racks in seconds with simple commands like 'eq8 -> compressor -> reverb'. supports parameter defaults, macro mappings with custom ranges, and switchable variations
expanded_content.impact: personal productivity tool that lets me focus on sound design instead of clicking through menus. demonstrates intersection of data engineering patterns and creative workflows

projects.title: mfc
projects.summary: cli tool for programmatically authoring arturia minifreak synthesizer presets from config files
projects.full_description: CLI tool for programmatically authoring Arturia MiniFreak synthesizer presets from config files

expanded_content.problem: creating and managing presets for the arturia minifreak is slow and manual. the hardware editor is fine for tweaking but terrible for batch creation or systematic preset design
expanded_content.approach: python cli that reads and writes minifreak preset files. toml-based configuration for defining oscillator types, filter settings, and modulation routing. template system for rapid iteration
expanded_content.results: programmatic preset generation from config files. batch creation of preset variations. systematic exploration of the minifreak's sound engine
expanded_content.impact: another music tool that automates the tedious parts of sound design. same pattern as racksmith but for hardware synth presets

projects.title: mxd
projects.summary: cli tool and wasm preview app for building korg minilogue xd user oscillators with browser-based ...
projects.full_description: CLI tool and WASM preview app for building Korg Minilogue XD user oscillators with browser-based testing

expanded_content.problem: developing custom oscillators for the korg minilogue xd requires wrestling with the logue sdk toolchain, cross-compiling for arm, and no way to preview without loading onto hardware
expanded_content.approach: python cli wrapping the full logue sdk workflow. emscripten/wasm compilation for browser-based oscillator preview. docker builds for consistent cross-compilation. typer for ergonomic cli
expanded_content.results: full dev cycle from 'mxd init' to hardware binary. browser preview eliminates the upload-test-repeat loop. preset system for testing different parameter combinations
expanded_content.impact: evolved from basic logue_osc experiments into a proper development toolkit. bridges embedded c programming with modern python developer experience

projects.title: date night
projects.summary: full-stack san diego date planning app for indecisive with smart filtering and suggestions
projects.full_description: Full-stack San Diego date planning app for the indecisive with smart filtering and suggestions

expanded_content.problem: deciding what to do on a date night in san diego always ends in analysis paralysis. too many options, no way to filter or plan efficiently
expanded_content.approach: full-stack web app with next.js frontend and fastapi backend. radix ui components with framer motion animations. postgresql database with sqlalchemy async orm. deployed on render
expanded_content.results: date planning app with smart filtering, suggestions, and a polished ui. mobile-friendly with animated interactions
expanded_content.impact: fun personal project that solves a real problem. first full-stack app with next.js frontend and python backend working together

projects.title: stitch chords
projects.summary: high-density music theory reference pwa for keyboard players with artist harmonic mapping and cho...
projects.full_description: High-density music theory reference PWA for keyboard players with artist harmonic mapping and chord expansion engine

expanded_content.problem: learning complex chord voicings and artist-specific harmonic techniques means jumping between scattered music theory resources. no single reference optimized for keyboard players
expanded_content.approach: react pwa with terminal-inspired aesthetic. music theory engine that parses chord symbols into intervals and note spellings. artist harmonic libraries with roman numeral analysis
expanded_content.results: high-density reference app with artist chord maps (radiohead, apparat, nils frahm), harmonic expansion engine, live transpose, and song builder. works offline as pwa
expanded_content.impact: bridges music theory and engineering. demonstrates ability to build domain-specific tools with complex internal logic

projects.title: music rip
projects.summary: cli tool for downloading and organizing audio from youtube for sampling and dj sets
projects.full_description: CLI tool for downloading and organizing audio from YouTube for sampling and DJ sets

expanded_content.problem: finding and downloading samples or tracks for dj sets involves too many clicks and manual file management. needed a streamlined workflow
expanded_content.approach: python cli wrapping yt-dlp with sensible defaults for audio quality, automatic metadata tagging, and organized output directories. poetry for dependency management
expanded_content.results: one command to download, convert, and organize audio files. integrates into music production workflow seamlessly
expanded_content.impact: simple utility that saves time in the creative process. example of building small tools to solve personal friction points
